modName: Beast form spell - turns the player into a giant or falmer
summary:
Adds a spell in the game turning into a giant or falmer.
(Polymorph concept)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#008800][u][b]Transforms the player into a beast.[/b][/u][/color]

[u][b]Location:[/b][/u]

The \"Spell Tome: Beast Form\" is in the camp Bleakwind Basin (See a screenshot).

[color=#008800][u][b]Giant special combat controls:[/b][/u][/color]

Forward + Left Attack= Bash
Backward + Left Attack = Stomp
Forward + Right Attack = Club Power Attack
Backward + Right Attack = Back Attack

[color=#008800][b]To turn back just briefly go into any game menu.[/b][/color]
After returning back to the game will receive a confirmation message.

[u][b]Installation:[/b][/u]

Place the contents of the archive in the folder \"Data\".
Activate the mod in SkyrimLauncher.

[color=#008800][b]If you have previously installed old version of the mod, you must:[/b][/color]

1) Make sure you save the current game you\'re not in the form of a giant.
2) Delete Files mode (Shoo_WereGiant.esp, Shoo_WereGiant.bsa, Shoo_WereGiant.bsl, Shoo_GiantForm, Shoo_GiantForm.bsa) from the folder \"Data\"
3) Run the game and save.
4) Install the new version and play.

[u]Note:[/u]

In principle it is possible to make a spell to transform into any creature of Skyrim.

[color=#008800][b]Endorse me if You like my work![/b][/color]
[color=#008800]Thanks![/color]
[color=#008800]Please credit me for all my files you use.[/color]
author: ShooD
